title: New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park: For Kids
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     For Kids              For Kids                    The youngest visitors to our park will find activities and special events designed just for them.             Activities for kids inside the visitor center    Click the images below to download activities        Junior Ranger Book      Be a Junior Ranger! Pick up your free Junior Ranger activity booklet at the park visitor center or download and print a copy right now.         Underwater Explorer Junior Ranger Book      To earn an Underwater Explorer badge, Pick up your free activity booklet at the park visitor center or download and print a copy right now.         Civil War Trading Cards      The park is offering free trading cards featuring figures of the Civil War who had ties to New Bedford. The cards are part of a series of cards available at participating national parks throughout the United States.           For kid-friendly special events check our park calendar and social media sites.     Not able to make it to the park? Check out the Park Fun section that offers a variety of activities for kids.
